verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of every one of them a \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* according to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \add their\add* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, of all their \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* according to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w rods|strong="H4294"\w*: \w write|strong="H3789"\w* thou every \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* upon his \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*.

And thou shalt \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* upon the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*: for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* \add shall be\add* for the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

And thou shalt lay them \w up|strong="H3240"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, where I will \w meet|strong="H3259"\w* with you.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* the \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, whom I shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, shall \w blossom|strong="H6524"\w*: and I will make to \w cease|strong="H7918"\w* from me the \w murmurings|strong="H8519"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whereby they \w murmur|strong="H3885"\w* against you.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and every one of their \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him a \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* apiece, for each \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w*, according to their \w fathers’|strong="H0001"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \add even\add* \w twelve|strong="H6240"\w* \w rods|strong="H4294"\w*: and the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \add was\add* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* their \w rods|strong="H4294"\w*.\f + \fr 17.6 \ft a rod…: Heb. a rod for one prince, a rod for one prince\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* laid \w up|strong="H3240"\w* the \w rods|strong="H4294"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of \w witness|strong="H5715"\w*.

And it came to pass, that on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of \w witness|strong="H5715"\w*; and, behold, the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* was \w budded|strong="H6524"\w*, and brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w buds|strong="H6525"\w*, and \w bloomed|strong="H6692"\w* \w blossoms|strong="H6731"\w*, and \w yielded|strong="H1580"\w* \w almonds|strong="H8247"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* brought \w out|strong="H3318"\w* all the \w rods|strong="H4294"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and they \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, to be \w kept|strong="H4931"\w* for a \w token|strong="H0226"\w* against the \w rebels|strong="H4805"\w*; and thou shalt quite take \w away|strong="H3615"\w* their \w murmurings|strong="H8519"\w* from me, that they \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not.\f + \fr 17.10 \ft rebels: Heb. children of rebellion\f*
And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add so:\add* as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him, so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* he.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, we \w die|strong="H1478"\w*, we \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, we all \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

Whosoever cometh any thing \w near|strong="H7131"\w* unto the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: shall we be \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w* with \w dying|strong="H1478"\w*?
